text:
Thank you!
The email is changed to the Phone number on the ‘Property to include in code’ (and create a new secret). But the result is still the same. The property is ‘undefined’

I tried to change the ‘propertyName’ in line 28 to phone to see if it would make sense but it also failed.

Hello. I have a question around how I can view customer calendars once they are authenticated in our app via token. How can this be achieved in HubSpot. I understand by default this is not achievable. We are building a Virtual assistant app, and our agents are needing exposure to our customers calendars (iCal,Gmail,Outlook) to create events etc. Looking to be pointed in the right direction/channel.
Hi Camille, I believe this is a function of Marketing Pro plan. We have Sales Pro and basic marketing.
